Html.name: Html0
Html.content: FigureÂ [location_picker_choose_location] shows the dialog that opens when you alter the location via the widget. The dialog's appearance depends on the widget's configuration. The dialog below is displayed for the default configuration that allows all values stored by the widget to be changed. To change the values, you can edit them manually. But for changing the address and the coordinates, you can also move the placemark in the map.
